@qraanTV. No, I read the koran. And England has an increasing problem with Islamic paedophile rings. They think it's ok because they are emulating Mohammed. Turns out it's not just "unbelievers". A friend of mine is an Ahmedi muslim. His family moved to the UK to escape persecution and death threats in Pakistan, and he now has to travel 40 miles to go to a mosque to avoid persecution and death threats from other muslims  in our  home town.
